member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressClaim
member.summary: Contains address claim properties

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressClaim.Formatted
member.summary: Full mailing address, formatted for display or use on a mailing label. This field MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines. Newlines can be represented either as a carriage return/line feed pair ("\r\n") or as a single line feed character ("\n").

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressClaim.StreetAddress
member.summary: Full street address component, which MAY include house number, street name, Post Office Box, and multi-line extended street address information. This field MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines. Newlines can be represented either as a carriage return/line feed pair ("\r\n") or as a single line feed character ("\n").

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressClaim.Locality
member.summary: City or locality component.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressClaim.Region
member.summary: State, province, prefecture, or region component.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressClaim.PostalCode
member.summary: Zip code or postal code component.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressClaim.Country
member.summary: Country name component.

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressScopeClaims
member.summary: This scope value requests access to the address Claim.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AddressScopeClaims.Address
member.summary: End-User's preferred postal address. The value of the address member is a JSON [RFC4627] structure containing some or all of the members defined in Section 5.1.1.

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizedUserInfo
member.summary: Information about authorized user

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizedUserInfo.Subject
member.summary: Subject (user) identifier

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizedUserInfo.Profile
member.summary: Claims for `profile` scope

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizedUserInfo.Address
member.summary: Claims for `address` scope

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizedUserInfo.Email
member.summary: Claims for `email` scope

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizedUserInfo.Phone
member.summary: Claims for `phone` scope

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizedUserInfo.CustomScopes
member.summary: Claims for custom scopes

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.CustomScopeClaims
member.summary: Contains claim for custom scope

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.EmailScopeClaims
member.summary: This scope value requests access to the email and email_verified Claims.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.EmailScopeClaims.Email
member.summary: End-User's preferred e-mail address. Its value MUST conform to the RFC 5322 [RFC5322] addr-spec syntax. The RP MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique, as discussed in Section 5.7.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.EmailScopeClaims.EmailVerified
member.summary: True if the End-User's e-mail address has been verified; otherwise false. When this Claim Value is true, this means that the OP took affirmative steps to ensure that this e-mail address was controlled by the End-User at the time the verification was performed. The means by which an e-mail address is verified is context-specific, and dependent upon the trust framework or contractual agreements within which the parties are operating.

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginError
member.summary: Describes login process error

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginError.Type
member.summary: Error type

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginError.Description
member.summary: Human readable description

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginErrorType
member.summary: Login process type

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginErrorType.Undefined
member.summary: Undefined

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginErrorType.UserCancel
member.summary: User cancel login

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginErrorType.ServerReject
member.summary: Server reject user credentials

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginErrorType.ServerError
member.summary: Unhandled server error

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.LoginErrorType.TemporarilyUnavailable
member.summary: Server can't process login temporarily

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.PhoneScopeClaims
member.summary: This scope value requests access to the phone_number and phone_number_verified Claims.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.PhoneScopeClaims.PhoneNumber
member.summary: End-User's preferred telephone number. E.164 [E.164] is RECOMMENDED as the format of this Claim, for example, +1 (425) 555-1212 or +56 (2) 687 2400. If the phone number contains an extension, it is RECOMMENDED that the extension be represented using the RFC 3966 [RFC3966] extension syntax, for example, +1 (604) 555-1234;ext=5678.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.PhoneScopeClaims.PhoneNumberVerified
member.summary: True if the End-User's phone number has been verified; otherwise false. When this Claim Value is true, this means that the OP took affirmative steps to ensure that this phone number was controlled by the End-User at the time the verification was performed. The means by which a phone number is verified is context-specific, and dependent upon the trust framework or contractual agreements within which the parties are operating. When true, the phone_number Claim MUST be in E.164 format and any extensions MUST be represented in RFC 3966 format.

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims
member.summary: This scope value requests access to the End-User's default profile Claims

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Name
member.summary: End-User's full name in displayable form including all name parts, possibly including titles and suffixes, ordered according to the End-User's locale and preferences.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.FamilyName
member.summary: Surname(s) or last name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple family names or no family name; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.GivenName
member.summary: Given name(s) or first name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple given names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.MiddleName
member.summary: Middle name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple middle names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters. Also note that in some cultures, middle names are not used.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.NickName
member.summary: Casual name of the End-User that may or may not be the same as the given_name. For instance, a nickname value of Mike might be returned alongside a given_name value of Michael.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.PreferredUsername
member.summary: Shorthand name by which the End-User wishes to be referred to at the RP, such as janedoe or j.doe. This value MAY be any valid JSON string including special characters such as @, /, or whitespace. The RP MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique, as discussed in Section 5.7.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Profile
member.summary: URL of the End-User's profile page. The contents of this Web page SHOULD be about the End-User.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Picture
member.summary: URL of the End-User's profile picture. This URL MUST refer to an image file (for example, a PNG, JPEG, or GIF image file), rather than to a Web page containing an image. Note that this URL SHOULD specifically reference a profile photo of the End-User suitable for displaying when describing the End-User, rather than an arbitrary photo taken by the End-User.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Website
member.summary: URL of the End-User's Web page or blog. This Web page SHOULD contain information published by the End-User or an organization that the End-User is affiliated with.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Gender
member.summary: End-User's gender. Values defined by this specification are female and male. Other values MAY be used when neither of the defined values are applicable.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Birthdate
member.summary: End-User's birthday, represented as an ISO 8601:2004 [ISO8601‑2004] YYYY-MM-DD format. The year MAY be 0000, indicating that it is omitted. To represent only the year, YYYY format is allowed. Note that depending on the underlying platform's date related function, providing just year can result in varying month and day, so the implementers need to take this factor into account to correctly process the dates.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Zoneinfo
member.summary: String from zoneinfo [zoneinfo] time zone database representing the End-User's time zone. For example, Europe/Paris or America/Los_Angeles.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.Locate
member.summary: End-User's locale, represented as a BCP47 [RFC5646] language tag. This is typically an ISO 639-1 Alpha-2 [ISO639‑1] language code in lowercase and an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 [ISO3166‑1] country code in uppercase, separated by a dash. For example, en-US or fr-CA. As a compatibility note, some implementations have used an underscore as the separator rather than a dash, for example, en_US; Relying Parties MAY choose to accept this locale syntax as well.

member.name: P:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ProfileScopeClaims.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Time the End-User's information was last updated. Its value is a JSON number representing the number of seconds from 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z as measured in UTC until the date/time.

member.name: T:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.ScopeClaims
member.summary: The base for object with claim properties

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of

member.summary: Converts claims to
